text: 6.12 Jon 12.31, 14.30, Lom 8.38, 1 Ko 15.50, Kol 2.15, 1 Pi 5.8-9 Binɨb okok ayɨp penpen ma gobun, kɨcheki walɨjpal okok ayɨp penpen gobun. Kɨcheki binɨb okok kɨlop kod mɨdebal okok sek, kɨcheki kɨles mɨdebal okok sek, kɨcheki lum awl kod mɨdebal okok sek, kɨcheki adek oklaŋ kod mɨdebal okok sek, tap anɨb okok mɨdupsek ñɨn anɨb ak kɨsɨlɨm nab okok ayɨp penpen gobun.
